Subskills.name: Dense Haze
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of miasma.

Subskills.name: Contagious Mist
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poisoned on hit.

Subskills.name: Tenacious Stench
Subskills.description: Miasma sticks to the target with increased size and damage.

Subskills.name: Harmful Poluents
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by miasma.

Subskills.name: Eroding Haze
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to poisoned targets.

Subskills.name: Hemoglobin Nova
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash additional miasma clouds from poisoned targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Incendiary Fumes
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Epinephrine Addict
Subskills.description: Striking monsters gives you a stack of epinephrine addict increasing your attack speed, movement speed and attack range. At maximum stacks gain phasing movement.

Subskills.name: Intense Malodor
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit with increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Sweep Scourge
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using miasma.

Subskills.name: Meteoric Haze
Subskills.description: Chance to drop a burning meteor at burning targets on hit unleashing multiple fire balls to all directions when exploding.

Subskills.name: Shoulder Fling
Subskills.description: Fling targets behind you on hit inflicting elemental break and stunning them. Miasma clouds now spawn behind you.

Subskills.name: Epidemic Dissemination
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple miasma clouds in an arc when attacking. Miasma no longer requires you to strike a target.
